name: Run Jump Fail
description: You wanna run? You wanna jump? You're gonna fail. Again. And Again. But its fun to fail...right? Take control of HappyMan and hop skip and jump your way past low walls, big balls and spinning red things! A bunch of obstacles await, so get to it.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7+ Processor: Intel Core 2 or better Graphics: DirectX9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
